profile.name: Ryan Dahl
profile.headline: @denoland Senior Software Engineer | Exploring Rust Systems Programming & Frameworks
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for Rust systems programming and exploring various frameworks such as Deno, Preact, and Svelte. With a strong background in Python and experience in database sharding and type systems.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer @denoland
description: Leading the development of Deno, a modern JavaScript runtime.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive innovation and growth.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developing custom software solutions for clients across various industries.
Providing expert advice on Python and Rust systems programming.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributing to open-source projects, including bug fixes and feature enhancements.
Collaborating with other developers to drive project forward.
